pullrequest.title: try getting release-tools scripts using curl instead of hg

content.raw:
testing:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_dsl_brew_release/25/
* https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder-elcapitan/47/console

the test build did not have mercurial installed, and it is proceeding, so this looks successful
